mapper.select: SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '病案号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '患者卡证号码是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODRISU_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱组号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODR_GN IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '执行护士姓名是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NURSE_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '住院号是否填写' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND HP_S_NO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出生日期是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出生日期是否早于1900年01月01日' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY<=TO_DATE('1900-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '卡证类型代码是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE not in ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07','99') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '是否药品填写是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_DRUG not in ('1','2') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医疗机构编码是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ORGAN_CODE !='320583467170265' union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医院记录患者性别是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SEX not in ('1','2') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱开始执行时间是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BEGIN_TIME>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱开始执行时间是否早于1950年01月01日' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BEGIN_TIME<=TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱类别填写是否符合值域' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODR_TYPE not in ('1','2','9') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱停止执行时间是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND STOP_DT>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱停止执行时间是否早于1950年01月01日' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND STOP_DT<=TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱下达时间是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODRISU_DT>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医嘱下达时间是否早于1950年01月01日' as khnr, OUT_H_DATE FROM DoctorAdviceRecord WHERE OUT_H_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_H_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ODRISU_DT<=TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT ORGAN_NAME , HP_S_NO , '病案号是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MR_NO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录的详细描述是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND HOS_COURSE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录日期是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_DATE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录唯一ID号是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_ID IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病人姓名是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '归档日期时间是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '患者就诊卡证号码是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDNO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '患者就诊卡证类型是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '没有记录患者出生日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否不明原因肺炎病例是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_UN_PNEU IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否传染病或疑似病例是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_INF_CASE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否危重病例是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_CRI_CASE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否疑难病例是否填写' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_DIF_CASE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '首次/日常病程记录标识是否填写' AS khnr, to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_DATE <= TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '病程记录日期是否早于出生日期' AS AND PROGRESS_DATE <= BIRTHDAY union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '出生日期是否晚于系统日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '出生日期是否早于1900年01月01日' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY <= TO_DATE('1900-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '归档日期是否晚于系统日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '归档日期是否早于出生日期' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT <= BIRTHDAY union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '卡证类型代码是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE not in ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07','99') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否不明原因肺炎病例填写是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_UN_PNEU not in ('0','1') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否传染病或疑似病例填写是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_INF_CASE not in ('0','1') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否危重病例填写是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_CRI_CASE not in ('0','1') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '是否疑难病例填写是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_DIF_CASE not in ('0','1') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '首次或者日常病程记录标识是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROGRESS_MARK not in ('1','2') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO , '医院记录患者性别是否符合值域' AS khnr, POF_DT FROM CourseRecord WHERE POF_DT >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SEX not in ('1','2')

SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '病案号是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MR_NO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '病人姓名是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出院（或死亡）日期时间是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_HP_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出院记录/死亡记录标识是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OHREC_DREC IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出院科室编码是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OH_DPT_CODE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出院科室名称是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OH_DPT_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出院唯一ID号是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_HOS_ID IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '归档日期时间是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '患者就诊卡证号码是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDNO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '患者就诊卡证类型是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '记录日期时间是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '没有记录患者出生日期' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '入院日期时间是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IN_HP_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '入院时情况是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IN_HP_ILL_CON IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '伤口愈合是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND WOUND_TYPE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '是否做过手术是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IS_OPERATION IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '手术日期时间是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SEX IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医生对出院（或死亡）诊断的描述是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OHD_DIS_DES IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医生对入院诊断的描述是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IHD_DIS_DES IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医生对手术情况的描述是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OPERATION_DES IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医生身份证号是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DOC_IDCARD is NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '医生姓名是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DOC_NAME is NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '主治医师姓名是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MAJ_DOC_NAME is NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '住院号是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND HP_S_NO is NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '住院经过（抢救经过）是否填写' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND HP_CUR_PRO is NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出生日期是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出生日期是否早于1900年01月01日' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY<=TO_DATE('1900-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出院记录/死亡记录标识是否符合值域' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OHREC_DREC not in ('1','2','3') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '出院日期是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_HP_DT>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '归档日期是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '归档日期是否早于入院日期' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT<IN_HP_DT union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '卡证类型代码是否符合值域' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE not in ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07','99') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '入院日期是否晚于出院日期' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IN_HP_DT>OUT_HP_DT union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '入院日期是否早于1950年01月01日' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IN_HP_DT<=TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '入院日期是否早于出生日期' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IN_HP_DT<=BIRTHDAY union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '入院日期是否早于出生日期' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IN_HP_DT<=BIRTHDAY union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, HP_S_NO, '是否尸体病理解剖是否符合值域' as khnr, POF_DT FROM OutHospitalRecord WHERE POF_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND POF_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IF_AUTOPSY not in ('0','1')

SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '财务收费项目分类代码是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND FIN_CAT_CODE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '患者就诊卡证号码是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDNO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '患者就诊卡证类型是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DPT_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '门诊/急诊/住院编号是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OP_EM_HP_NO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '门诊/急诊/住院标识是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OP_EM_HP_MARK IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费/退费标志是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CHARGE_REFUND IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费机构编码是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ORGAN_CODE IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费机构名称是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ORGAN_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费日期和时间是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费项目唯一ID号是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CHARGE_PROJ_ID IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费员身份证号是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_IDCARD IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费员姓名是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '项目单价（元）' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROJ_UP IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '项目金额（元）' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROJ_MON IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '项目明细编号是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROJ_DENO IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '项目名称（包含药品）是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROJ_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '项目数量' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROJ_AMT IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '项目自付金额（元）是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND IND_PAY IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '卡财务收费项目分类代码是否符合值域' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND FIN_CAT_CODE not in ('0100','0200','0300','0400','0500','0600','0700','0800','0900','1000','1001','1002','1003','1100','9900','99') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '卡证类型代码是否符合值域' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE not in ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07','99') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '门诊/急诊/住院标识填写是否符合值域' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OP_EM_HP_MARK not in ('1','2','3') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费/退费标志是否符合值域' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CHARGE_REFUND not in ('1','2') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费机构编码是否符合值域' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ORGAN_CODE !='320583467170265' union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费日期和时间是否晚于系统日期' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT>=sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '收费日期和时间是否早于1950年01月01日' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT<=TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '项目金额（元）≠项目单价（元）×项目数量' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROJ_MON!=PROJ_UP*PROJ_AMT union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '项目金额（元）是否小于项目单价（元）' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND PROJ_MON<PROJ_UP union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '是否属于门诊医保项目是否符合值域' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OUT_MED_INS not in ('0','1') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '是否属于住院医保项目是否符合值域' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostDetails WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND INP_MED_INS not in ('0','1')

SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '发票号码是否填写' as khnr, RCD_DT FROM CostRecord WHERE RCD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RCD_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND INVOICE_NO IS NULL TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DIAG_DT<=TO_DATE('1950-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_HP_NO, '诊断日期和时间是否早于出生日期' as khnr, APPLY_DT FROM TransfusionRecord WHERE APPLY_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND APPLY_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DIAG_DT<=BIRTHDAY

FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SEX IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '姓名是否填写' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '出生日期是否晚于系统日期' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY>sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '出生日期是否早于1900年01月01日' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND BIRTHDAY < to_date('19000101','yyyymmdd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '主要诊断疾病名称是否填写' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MDIS_NAME IS NULL union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '记录日期和时间是否晚于系统日期' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT>sysdate union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '记录日期和时间是否早于1950年01月01日' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < to_date('19500101','yyyymmdd') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '记录日期和时间是否早于出生日期' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < BIRTHDAY union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '卡证类型代码是否符合值域' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND CARDTYPE not in ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07','99') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '门诊或者急诊标志填写是否符合值域' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND OP_EM_MARK not in('1','2') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '医生身份证号格式是否正确' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND length(DOC_IDCARD) <> 18 union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '医院记录患者性别是否符合值域' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SEX not in('1','2') union all SELECT ORGAN_NAME, OP_EM_NO, '治疗处置项目分类是否符合值域' khnr, REC_DT FROM TREATMENTRECORD WHERE REC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND REC_DT < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TREAT_TYPE not in ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07','51','99')
